channel.title: Personal on Imperial Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Imperial Blog

item.title: Blog Update I
item.description: So it’s been more than a month since my last update and in the good blogging fashion I need to get you up to date of what I’ve been doing. Some stuff to let you know this project is still kicking and put you in the context of my life.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello there. I’m Gabriel, a 36 year old guy from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I’m a Business Intelligence Analyst, freelance web developer, IT Engineering undergrad and future husband. I have always dreamed of making a game and developing it as a business and now I’m giving it a real shot. I’d like to make it my living and if not, at least I’ll learn a lot of new things to beef up my resume.

item.title: Blog Introduction & A Bit Of History
item.description:
Welcome to the Imperial Might Development Blog! You may very well have a broad picture of the game visiting the About The Game. If really interested in the game, check out The Newsletter section so we keep in touch. In About Me you will know a little bit about who is behind all this thing.

This is a timid first post where I share a little bit of history about how I decided to start the game as a good first post to introduce the blog.
